pages.title: Armor & Wearables
pages.text: Hexalia grants subtle, situational power through garments and trinkets—tools of survival as much as style.

pages.title: Ghost Veil
pages.text: A spectral chestpiece that shrouds the wearer. While crouching, you turn invisible as durability slowly drains—perfect for escapes and stealth.

pages.title: Bogged Boots
pages.text: Footwear woven for wetlands. Grants a strong boost to swimming speed, aiding underwater travel and exploration.

pages.title: Earplugs
pages.text: Fits the helmet slot to block harmful cries from nearby $(l:hexalia:resources/crops)Mandrakes$(/l). Keep a pair handy for garden work.
